citations.narrative:
During this inspection it was noted that 2 rabbits were being housed with a pot belly pig. Rabbits shall not be housed in
the same primary enclosure with any other species. To ensure the health and well being of the rabbits this situation will
need to be addressed.
***To Be Corrected By: August 10, 2021

During this inspection it was noted that the wallaby enclosure is in need of repair. The walls of the enclosure are
constructed of fake rock work and bamboo slats. However, there are at least 4 areas were the bamboo slats are 8" - 12"
apart. These gaps are large enough to allow people to gain access to the animal and also for the animal to escape or
injure itself. To ensure the animal is securely contained within this enclosure, these areas will need to be addressed.
***To Be Corrected By: July29, 2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.58 
   
Classification and separation. 
During this inspection it was noted that 2 rabbits were being housed with a pot belly pig. Rabbits shall not be housed in 
the same primary enclosure with any other species. To ensure the health and well being of the rabbits this situation will 
need to be addressed. 
***To Be Corrected By: August 10, 2021 
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
During this inspection it was noted that the wallaby enclosure is in need of repair. The walls of the enclosure are 
constructed of fake rock work and bamboo slats. However, there are at least 4 areas were the bamboo slats are 8" - 12" 
apart. These gaps are large enough to allow people to gain access to the animal and also for the animal to escape or 
injure itself. To ensure the animal is securely contained within this enclosure, these areas will need to be addressed. 
***To Be Corrected By: July29, 2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
